mapper.select: SELECT RNO, ID, NAME, MDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, ID, NAME, TO_CHAR(MDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') MDATE FROM (SELECT ID, NAME, MDATE FROM MYCGV_MEMBER ORDER BY MDATE DESC)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GGA_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ROWNUM RNO, ID, NAME, CARNUM, TO_CHAR(MDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDATE FROM (SELECT ID, NAME, CARNUM, MDATE FROM GGA_MEMBER ORDER BY MDATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GGA_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASS = #{pass}
mapper.update: UPDATE GGA_MEMBER SET PASS = #{pass}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, CARNUM = #{carnum} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GGA_MEMBER(ID, PASS, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, TEL, PHONE, EMAIL, CARNUM, GENRE, MDATE) VALUES(#{id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{carnum}, #{genreList}, SYSDATE)
